title: Come Live Here! 3 bed 2 bath apartment
posting_body: ['Thank you for choosing Regal Towers', 'Property Address', '27500 Franklin Rd,', 'Southfield, MI, 48034', '<URL>', 'Take advantage of relaxed living in a great location with our deals on 3 bed 2 bath apartments.', "With rents as low as $1,299, these spacious 1150 square foot floor plans won't be available for long.", 'Call or stop by today!', 'Floor Plan Details', 'Name: 3 Bedroom', '3 Bedrooms / 2 Bathrooms', '1150 Sq.', 'Ft.', '$1,299', 'Community Amenities', 'Playground', 'Laundry Facilities', 'Swimming Pool', 'Tennis Court', 'Club House', 'Basketball Court', 'On-site Maintenance', '24-Hour emergency Maintenance', 'Full Equipped Fitness Center', 'Pets are Welcome (restrictions apply)', 'Public Transportation', 'BBQ Area', 'Gated Community', 'Property Contact', 'show contact info', 'David', 'ADA ACCESSIBLE', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY']
